laboratory_examinations.findings: Gallbladder is significantly distended with diffuse gallbladder wall edema. Single 1.2 cm gallstone lodged in the neck of the gallbladder. No pericholecystic fluid. Normal common hepatic duct measuring 6 mm. Right kidney normal, left kidney limited visualization. 4.0 cm cyst in left kidney. No ascites. Proximal abdominal aorta measuring 3 cm.
